            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609309992&amp;ssig=ezP5qvV%2FGI" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475679506679372" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvKLIs1BO?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-25 02:23" date="1582568611000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475679506679372:fromprofile"> 2月25日 02:23</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%A5%E9%98%B2%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#青岛要求严防境外人员输入#</a>】24日下午，青岛市新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部召开会议强调：要在全面做好社区防控的同时，严防境外人员输入，强化风险评估和口岸检疫，严格落实来青人员体温检测和居家隔离等措施，主动做好外籍人士沟通解释和服务保障工作，坚决防止疫情输入扩散。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=青岛发布">@青岛发布</a> ​​​ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475635890013512" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvJDn03vW?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 23:30" date="1582558212000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475635890013512:fromprofile"> 2月24日 23:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <div comment_id="4475636082783619" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%97%85%E6%88%BF%E9%81%87%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%9C%E5%8C%97%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#隔离病房遇上东北医生#</a> 画风突变……<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，在湖北的隔离病房内，因有了很多东北的医护人员，画风突变。他们为患者唱二人转，用亲切的东北话与患者交流，医生与患者的关系更是杠杠的。也让网友纷纷表示东北医生太难了。愿你们早日平安归来！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475612138060084:2017607-video:2017607%3A4475601441193988:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475628692854112:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hkOG2o" alt="http://t.cn/A6hkOG2o" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 【《祝你平安，2020》MV 为平安祈愿，为战“疫”加油！】“祝你平安（噢）祝你平安……”2月24日，人民网和<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E4%BA%A7%E4%B8%9A%E5%9F%BA%E5%9C%B0?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=国家音乐产业基地">@国家音乐产业基地</a> 联合制作的人民战“疫”公益MV《祝你平安，2020》上线，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%9D%A8%E5%B9%82?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=杨幂">@杨幂</a>、<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%88%98%E6%B6%9Btamia?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=刘涛tamia">@刘涛tamia</a>、<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%9C%8D%E5%B0%8A?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=霍尊">@霍尊</a>、陈鲁豫等艺人为爱发声，为平安祈愿，为战“疫”加油！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvJiBvfkh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475623017447085:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475623017447085&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

           </div>

                                <a name="4475612138060084" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvJ13xONm?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 21:55" date="1582552548000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475612138060084:fromprofile"> 2月24日 21:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%97%85%E6%88%BF%E9%81%87%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%9C%E5%8C%97%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#隔离病房遇上东北医生#</a> 画风突变……<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，在湖北的隔离病房内，因有了很多东北的医护人员，画风突变。他们为患者唱二人转，用亲切的东北话与患者交流，医生与患者的关系更是杠杠的。也让网友纷纷表示东北医生太难了。愿你们早日平安归来！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475612138060084:2017607-video:2017607%3A4475601441193988:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475612138060084:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hkOG2o" alt="http://t.cn/A6hkOG2o" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475605267915313" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvIPYxd8l?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 21:28" date="1582550911000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475605267915313:fromprofile"> 2月24日 21:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【钟南山：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E5%83%8F%E6%B5%81%E6%84%9F%E7%BB%8F%E5%B8%B8%E6%80%A7%E7%88%86%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#新冠病毒不会像流感经常性爆发#</a>】国家卫健委高级别专家组组长钟南山：SARS在17年间有零星地出现，但没形成气候。COVID-19将来会不会长期存在、只不过没有形成爆发形势？也有可能。关键就是要控制它到最少。我认为它不会像流感，流感每年都有，这种可能性应该较小。（央视） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIPYxd8l" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475605267915313:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475605267915313&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%23&amp;from=default">#新闻联播说#</a>【院感医生：医务人员的安全守护神】娄昊来自郑州大学第一附属医院感染科，2月4日随队到武汉后，就一直在承担一线医生的感染防控工作。作为一名院感医生的一员，医护人员每次交班，娄昊都要跟着指导医务人员穿脱防护服，每日四交接班，娄昊从未缺席，他们也被医务人员亲切地称作“安全守护 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIKwajvh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475601882458255:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475601882458255&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%8B%89%E5%85%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AE%A4%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#伊拉克确认首例感染者#</a>，系从伊朗入境】新冠肺炎疫情在中东国家持续扩散。据伊拉克通讯社2月24日报道，该国卫生部的一份报告证实，在南部城市纳杰夫对一名进入伊拉克的伊朗宗教学学生进行检测后，确认其为新冠肺炎感染者。伊拉克政府此前已宣布暂时中止伊朗公民入境，报告表示这 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIEbrUko" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475597956651384:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475597956651384&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A850%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#日本累计确诊850例#</a>】截至当地时间24日晚，日本的新冠肺炎感染者共计850人。其中包括在日本国内的感染者和中国游客等145人，“钻石公主”号邮轮的乘客和乘务人员691人，以及乘坐日本政府包机回到日本国内的14人。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【中国-世卫组织联合考察专家组：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外省份社区传播有限#</a>】中国-世卫组织联合考察专家组中方组长梁万年介绍，关于新冠病毒肺炎疫情传播动力学分以下四种：①武汉传播：武汉早期发现的病例大多与华南海鲜市场的暴露有关，随后，病毒通过接触海鲜市场的人群扩散到社区，形成社区传 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvItVzPff" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475591598538469:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475591598538469&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IvIobvE7e&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609309992&amp;ssig=ezP5qvV%2FGI" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475588037542376" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvIobvE7e?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 20:20" date="1582546803000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475588037542376:fromprofile"> 2月24日 20:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%87%E5%BA%A6%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%E6%97%A0%E5%BC%82%E4%BA%8E%E6%95%A3%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#过度消毒无异于散毒#</a>】消毒是个技术活。不同地区和场合，需要选择相适应的消毒用品。同时，对消毒用品的成分、浓度、时长、消毒方式等都大有讲究。那些不考虑现实场合，只讲究表面的“快、准、狠”消毒，容易埋下药物残留的隐患，对人体和居家安全造成损害。同时，也不一定能达到理想消毒 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIobvE7e" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475588037542376:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475588037542376&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中国-世卫组织联合考察专家组：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F%E6%98%8E%E6%98%BE%E5%8F%98%E5%BC%82%23&amp;from=default">#新冠病毒未发生明显变异#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E5%B9%B4%E9%BE%84%E6%AE%B5%E4%BA%BA%E7%BE%A4%E6%99%AE%E9%81%8D%E6%98%93%E6%84%9F%23&amp;from=default">#各年龄段人群普遍易感#</a>新冠病毒】2月24日，中国—世界卫生组织新冠肺炎联合专家考察组在北京举行新闻发布会，考察组中方组长、国家卫健委新冠肺炎疫情应对处置工作专家组组长梁万年在会上通报：通过对不同地点分离出的104株新冠病毒株进行全 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIdcFdCK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475581229823822:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475581229823822&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="WB_face W_fl">
        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3276722231"><img alt="儿科陈医生" src="https://tva2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.1024/c34ed037jw1e8qgp5bmzyj2050050aa8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609310061&amp;ssig=hPgZjqwUYu" usercard="id=3276722231"></a>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3276722231" usercard="id=3276722231">儿科陈医生</a><a title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://kefu.weibo.com/faqdetail?id=20848"><span class="icon_icon"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans"></i></span></a>：冠状病毒是一类主要引起呼吸道、肠道疾病的微生物。到目前已经知道的人类冠状病毒有6种。其中4种在人群中较常见，一般以上呼吸道感染症状为主。另2种冠状病毒，就是SARS和MERS，具有较高的致病性，可引发致死性肺炎，是目前危害最大、最受关注的新型冠状病毒。加上新冠病毒，就有7种。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【习近平：抗疫斗争中少数干部表现不佳甚至很差！是这四种】2月23日，习近平总书记在统筹推进新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展工作部署会议上指出，干部政治上过不过得硬，就要看关键时刻靠不靠得住。总体看，在抗疫斗争中我们的干部队伍是好的，是经受住考验的，但也有少数干部表现不佳甚至很差。①不 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvIaVrtWd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475579816549941:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475579816549941&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 19:49</div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475577698741531" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvI7vAG4r?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 19:38" date="1582544338000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475577698741531:fromprofile"> 2月24日 19:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E9%87%8D%E6%96%B0%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%80%A7%E5%BE%88%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山表示出院重新感染可能性很小#</a>】2月24日，钟南山院士与武汉前方的广东医疗队ICU治疗团队再次开展远程视频会诊。会上，钟南山表示，病人治愈后重新感染的可能性很小，出院后检测再次出现阳性的结果，可能是因为试剂盒的敏感度不同造成的。接下来，可以通过检测血清IgG抗体等手段，来判断出院病 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvI7vAG4r" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475577698741531:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475577698741531&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475574262869403" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvI1Yc2sH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 19:25" date="1582543519000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475574262869403:fromprofile"> 2月24日 19:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：原则上<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%BE%97%E5%88%B0%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%E5%89%8D%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E4%B8%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#疫情得到有效控制前高校不开学#</a>】2月24日，教育部召开党组会，会议指出，要坚持属地原则、建立跟踪台账、做好开学准备、落实错峰返校。要统筹谋划高校开学工作。原则上疫情得到有效控制前大学生不返校、高校不开学；高校开学后，要严格措施，加大校园管理力度。（人民网教育频道）&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvI1Yc2sH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475574262869403:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475574262869403&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%BB%E9%9F%A9%E7%BE%8E%E5%86%9B%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%23&amp;from=default">#驻韩美军相关人员首次感染#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>韩联社报道称，大邱驻韩美军基地的美军家属被确诊感染新型冠状肺炎，感染者为一名61岁女性，这是驻韩美军相关人员首次出现感染病例。（人民日报） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%91%E8%A8%80%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%9D%9A%23&amp;from=default">#外交部发言人赵立坚#</a>质问《华尔街日报》：有骂人嚣张 为何没道歉勇气？】2月24日，外交部发言人赵立坚表示，面对恶意侮辱抹黑，中国不做“沉默的羔羊”。《华尔街日报》既然有骂人的嚣张，为什么没有道歉的勇气？该报既然一意孤行，就应当承担相应后果。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475567850559473:2017607-video:2017607%3A4475565168590881:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475567850559473:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hkwqKP" alt="http://t.cn/A6hkwqKP" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 19:12</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%97%E7%9F%AD%E5%B0%BE%E7%8C%B4%E4%B8%8A%E8%A1%97%E6%BA%9C%E8%BE%BE%E8%A2%AB%E5%BC%BA%E5%88%B6%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#云南短尾猴上街溜达被强制隔离#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/83/2018new_kuxiao_org.png" title="[允悲]" alt="[允悲]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，云南倘塘镇，一只猴子在街上乱跑，村民担心可能会传播疫情，随即报警。民警到达现场后发现，这是一只国家二级重点保护动物短尾猴。经检查，猴子健康状态良好，体温正常，随后被带到野生动物救助站进行强制隔离观察。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=时间视频">@时间视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475565416997366:1034-video:1034%3A4475527092699153:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475565416997366:2286908003" title="时间视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hDptfV" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDptfV" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>时间视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IvHLP3Vgf&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609310001&amp;ssig=ByMMQYXo%2F4" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475564250935099" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvHLP3Vgf?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 18:45" date="1582541132000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475564250935099:fromprofile"> 2月24日 18:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【31天，看见《人民战“疫”》】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>31场特别直播节目，总时长2580分钟，供稿媒体172家，出镜媒体75家，采访嘉宾67位，粉碎谣言48条，联动直播平台251家，单期最高播放量2000万，直播中央省市疫情防控新闻发布会133场，累计超过5亿人观看……这就是人民网、人民视频特别直播节目《人民战 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvHLP3Vgf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475564250935099:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475564250935099&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475560715993501" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvHG7p9bn?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 18:31" date="1582540289000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475560715993501:fromprofile"> 2月24日 18:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%9D%97%E7%81%BE%E9%98%B2%E6%B2%BB%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E7%BB%84%E6%8A%B5%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%23&amp;from=default">#中国蝗灾防治工作组抵巴基斯坦#</a>】近期巴基斯坦暴发沙漠蝗虫灾害，对巴农业生产和粮食安全造成严重影响。中国农业农村部会同国内有关部门，根据巴方需求，制定了援巴蝗灾防治工作方案，并于23日派出蝗灾防治工作组赴巴。工作组将在巴基斯坦开展蝗灾实地调研，并提供蝗灾防治技术支持。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvHG7p9bn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475560715993501:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475560715993501&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：951名农民工乘<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E9%A6%96%E8%B6%9F%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E5%8A%A1%E5%B7%A5%E5%AE%9A%E5%88%B6%E4%B8%93%E5%88%97%23&amp;from=default">#陕西首趟贫困地区务工定制专列#</a>赴沪复工】西安局铁路局集团公司根据洛南县地方政府申请，为951名务工人员定制“贫困地区务工定制专列”。24日晚，洛南县的771人将从西安车站乘坐Z88次“贫困地区务工定制专列”前往上海方向，复工复产。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475560619210657:1034-video:1034%3A4479069576691737:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475560619210657:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hkPfbW" alt="http://t.cn/A6hkPfbW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvHFXCE6Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475560619210657:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475560619210657&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6360574498&amp;cid=4475570349490192&amp;nick=柠枝0724&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 19:09</div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475555364133664" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvHxuhlm0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 18:10" date="1582539013000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475555364133664:fromprofile"> 2月24日 18:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【北京公园管理中心：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%8D%E5%9D%9A%E6%8C%81%E4%B8%80%E6%AE%B5%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E4%B8%8D%E5%8E%BB%E5%85%AC%E5%9B%AD%23&amp;from=default">#再坚持一段时间不去公园#</a>】北京市公园管理中心新闻发言人张亚红：天气转暖后出行意愿上升。建议再坚持一段时间，等到防控达到阶段性成果，会逐步恢复公园游览，建议大家少出门。如果去公园，建议全程佩戴口罩。园内活动不扎堆，不聚集，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%AC%E5%9B%AD%E5%86%85%E4%B8%8D%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%94%BB%E7%82%BC%E5%81%A5%E8%BA%AB%23&amp;from=default">#公园内不集中锻炼健身#</a>，不随地吐痰。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvHxuhlm0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475555364133664:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475555364133664&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609310001&amp;ssig=ByMMQYXo%2F4" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475553203398264" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvHu0eg2I?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 18:01" date="1582538498000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475553203398264:fromprofile"> 2月24日 18:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【扩散周知！今日起全面<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%81%E6%AD%A2%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%23&amp;from=default">#禁止食用野生动物#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A5%E5%8E%89%E6%89%93%E5%87%BB%E9%9D%9E%E6%B3%95%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%23&amp;from=default">#严厉打击非法野生动物交易#</a>】2月24日，全国人大常委会表决通过关于全面禁止非法野生动物交易、革除滥食野生动物陋习、切实保障人民群众生命健康安全的决定。确立了全面禁止食用野生动物的制度。对违反现行法律规定的，要在现行法律基础上加重处罚。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 18:02</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【宅家花式理发大赏：大叔刮胡刀理发把头刮流血 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E8%A2%AB%E8%BF%AB%E5%89%AA%E5%8F%91%E5%93%AD%E9%97%AE%E6%9C%89%E6%B2%A1%E6%9C%89%E5%81%87%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#孩子被迫剪发哭问有没有假发#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】二月二，龙抬头。受新冠肺炎疫情影响，很多人在家隔离选择自己理发，有人自己用刮胡刀、大剪刀给自己理发。还有孩子被迫剪发，哭着问家里有没有假发…<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%A5%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新京报我们视频">@新京报我们视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475548002813680:2017607-video:2017607%3A4475536894787611:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475548002813680:2286908003" title="有料的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hDTJUA" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDTJUA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>有料的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475544538046651" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvHg1xLiH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 17:27" date="1582536432000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475544538046651:fromprofile"> 2月24日 17:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%95%86%E5%8A%A1%E6%A5%BC%E5%AE%87%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB10%E9%A1%B9%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%23&amp;from=default">#北京商务楼宇防疫10项要求#</a>】北京明确在商务楼宇内办公单位的防疫要求：①鼓励弹性工作制、②严格落实居家/集中观察14天、③每日监测员工体温、④分流乘坐电梯、⑤降低办公密度、⑥重点区域每日消毒、⑦关闭回风、⑧分散就餐、⑨严格访客管理、⑩明确防疫责任人等10项防控要求。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvHg1xLiH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475544538046651:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475544538046651&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609310001&amp;ssig=ByMMQYXo%2F4" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475539324640978" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvH7Cjtku?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 17:06" date="1582535188000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475539324640978:fromprofile"> 2月24日 17:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【辟谣！网传“死者同学查获凶手后报警”系谣言】关于网传的受害人师兄妹提供破案线索，纯属谣言。公安机关收集办案证据，均是严格按照法律规定进行，并严格保护公民个人信息。在案件侦办中，专案组没有收到网传的受害人师兄妹提供的任何线索。​​​​<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475539324640978:1022-article:1022%3A2309354475539334234224:page_100206_home:2286908003::" title="28年前南医女生被杀案告破&nbsp;南京警方辟谣网络..." href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354475539334234224" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354475539334234224" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>28年前南医女生被杀案告破&nbsp;南京警方辟谣网络...</a> <a alt="http://t.cn/A6hDQwsK" suda-uatrack="key=transmit_pic&amp;value=transmit_pic_minicard" href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="object_id=1022:23079629054bc02bab8346a05bf6c708acf4bc&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc7lkxfeknj20920e13zi&amp;mid=4475539324640978&amp;short_url=http://t.cn/A6hDQwsK" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gc7lkxfeknj20920e13zi"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a>                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4475429476126125" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2328%E5%B9%B4%E5%89%8D%E5%8D%97%E5%8C%BB%E5%A4%A7%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E8%A2%AB%E6%9D%80%E6%A1%88%E5%91%8A%E7%A0%B4%23&amp;from=default">#28年前南医大女学生被杀案告破#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安南京">@平安南京</a> 23日通报：1992年3月24日，江苏南京市鼓楼区原南京医学院发生一起残忍杀害在校女学生林某的案件，因破案条件不足，凶手没有明确。2020年2月23日，专案组侦查取得重大破案线索，于当日凌晨抓获犯罪嫌疑人麻某某，目前案件正在进一步侦办中。 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4475429476126125&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc78i40kidj20j60x5n0x" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gc78i40kidj20j60x5n0x"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475429476126125:2286908003" href="/2286908003/IvEgrpHGt" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475429476126125">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【全国政协主席会议<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%94%BF%E5%8D%8F%E5%8D%81%E4%B8%89%E5%B1%8A%E4%B8%89%E6%AC%A1%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%AE%23&amp;from=default">#建议推迟全国政协十三届三次会议#</a>】日前，中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会召开第三十三次主席会议，研究了关于推迟召开全国政协十三届三次会议的相关事项，为贯彻落实中共中央关于统筹推进新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展工作的总体部署、组织全国各级政协组织和广大政协委 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvH4T0Wxx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475537630225031:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475537630225031&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B0%E5%B7%9E120%E5%A4%9A%E5%AE%B6%E7%89%9B%E8%82%89%E9%9D%A2%E9%A6%86%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%23&amp;from=default">#兰州120多家牛肉面馆复工#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/fa/2018new_chanzui_org.png" title="[馋嘴]" alt="[馋嘴]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】截至目前，兰州市已有120多家牛肉面馆复工。据了解，通过相关部门的检测，达到了复工复产要求的牛肉面馆，有店内堂食和外带两种消费形式。在店内堂食的顾客，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B0%E5%B7%9E%E7%89%9B%E8%82%89%E9%9D%A2%E9%A6%86%E5%8D%95%E4%BA%BA%E5%8D%95%E6%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#兰州牛肉面馆单人单桌#</a>，每一位顾客进店时都会进行手部酒精消毒。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网甘肃频道">@人民网甘肃频道</a> <a title="兰州市已有120多家牛肉面馆复工" href="http://t.cn/A6hDWCRL" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDWCRL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>兰州市已有120多家牛肉面馆复工</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%87%E6%97%85%E9%83%A8%E6%8F%90%E9%86%92%E8%BF%91%E6%9C%9F%E5%88%87%E5%8B%BF%E5%89%8D%E5%BE%80%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%97%85%E6%B8%B8%23&amp;from=default">#文旅部提醒近期切勿前往美国旅游#</a>】文化和旅游部发布赴美旅游安全提醒。近期，由于美方的过度防疫措施以及美国内安全形势，中国游客在美屡遭不公平对待。文化和旅游部提醒中国游客切实提高安全防范意识，切勿前往美国旅游。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hDWGFj" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDWGFj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6144003246" usercard="id=6144003246">王柬禾</a>：7月份美国有报道过两个人因为“不明原因肺炎”死亡，10月份大规模死人的时候，美国坚称“流感”，且没用采取手段，依旧允许出入境，伊朗出现感染，黎巴嫩出现感染，阿富汗出现感染，没用中国人，但是有美军，不认为美国在搞病毒战争，但是美国应该为自己的隐瞒和不故意传染向被感染国家赔偿道歉。        </div>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609310008&amp;ssig=OPLmLiC5ok" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475532261929526" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGWe85Xo?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 16:38" date="1582533505000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475532261929526:fromprofile"> 2月24日 16:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【送别！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%99%E5%BA%86%E6%9E%97%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E9%80%9D%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#沙庆林院士逝世#</a>】中国工程院院士、交通运输部公路科学研究院研究员沙庆林，因病于2020年2月23日在北京逝世，享年89岁。沙庆林把一生奉献给我国公路，他成功研究出国际领先的粗集料断级配设计与检验方法及新施工工艺，为我国长寿命路面奠定技术基础。他曾说：“我觉得为国奉献永远是我的天职 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvGWe85Xo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475532261929526:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475532261929526&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 16:25</div>

                                <a name="4475527849388909" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGP6Dou1?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 16:20" date="1582532453000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475527849388909:fromprofile"> 2月24日 16:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%85%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%9A%84%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%8A%A4%E7%9C%BC%23&amp;from=default">#宅在家的老人如何护眼#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA%E7%AA%81%E5%8F%91%E7%9C%BC%E7%97%85%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E9%9C%80%E7%AB%8B%E5%8D%B3%E5%B0%B1%E5%8C%BB%23&amp;from=default">#老人突发眼病是否需立即就医#</a>】①注意用眼卫生，不要躺着看书，看书时每小时起来活动，不用手使劲揉眼睛 不用自来水冲洗眼睛；②注意休息，经常按摩眼眶和面部，每次10分钟，每天数次。经常做眼保健操或闭目养神，种植及观看绿色植物；③合理膳食，多吃富含维生素食物；④区 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvGP6Dou1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475527849388909:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475527849388909&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <ul class="ipt">

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/IvGNPaqv3&amp;mid=4475527052485149&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc7kagyb0xj20go0goagr" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>70</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475523374098339" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGHThcaf?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 16:03" date="1582531385000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475523374098339:fromprofile"> 2月24日 16:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%B3%97%E5%AE%89%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E9%99%A2%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%AB%E5%85%8D%E8%81%8C%23&amp;from=default">#广东泗安医院院长被免职#</a>】据广东省卫健委：近日，网传广东省泗安医院院长语言粗暴对待职工的音频。广东省卫生健康委党组于2020年2月23日晚召开党组会议专题研究，决定对该院长免职处理并由调查组对该事件进行全面调查。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6herx8D" alt="http://t.cn/A6herx8D" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3896249165" usercard="id=3896249165">崇左林越</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a>：免职，指依法享有任免权的机关按照法律或制度规定免去公职人员所担任的职务。免职只是意味被免职人不再担任原职务，一般不具有惩罚性，所以公职人员正常的职务调动或触犯法规的公职人员会用到，他们因为当时不适任原职所以或是职务调动或是事后再担任原职，故“免职”并非一般人所认为的“撤职”。        </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月24日 16:12</div>

                                </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4475522635157265" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGGHlDDH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 16:00" date="1582531209000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475522635157265:fromprofile"> 2月24日 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：人民战 “疫”特别直播节目】国家卫健委统筹安排19个省份对口支援湖北。今天直播将重点聚焦云南省支援湖北省咸宁市的进展情况、以及咸宁市防疫、抗疫工作情况等。“七彩祥云”飞来，鄂南咸宁暖了，我们离胜利更近了。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#民民直播#</a>带您一起关注↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475522635157265:1034-video:1034%3A4479054062223382:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475522635157265:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hDo8iZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDo8iZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

                                <a name="4475520379350695" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGD3DexF?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 15:51" date="1582530672000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475520379350695:fromprofile"> 2月24日 15:51</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%9A%E5%B7%B2%E6%8D%90%E8%B5%A011.58%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BF%E4%BF%9D%E9%A2%9D%E4%BF%9D%E9%99%A9%23&amp;from=default">#全行业已捐赠11.58万亿保额保险#</a>】中国银保监会吉昱华：全行业累计捐赠总计保额11.58万亿的保险保障。把捐赠保单视同正常保单，同样管理和理赔。关于保险公司能否很好的履行服务承诺和赔付承诺的问题，大家要有信心。银保监会将加大对保险公司捐赠行为的监督检查，确保规范运作，确保及时理赔。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvGD3DexF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475520379350695:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475520379350695&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【新任！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%91%E8%A8%80%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%9D%9A%23&amp;from=default">#外交部发言人赵立坚#</a>亮相】2月24日，外交部新任发言人、新闻司副司长赵立坚亮相记者会。此前，赵立坚于2019年8月任外交部新闻司副司长。现任外交部发言人将有<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%8E%E6%98%A5%E8%8E%B9%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E8%B5%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%9D%9A%23&amp;from=default">#华春莹耿爽赵立坚#</a>3人。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4475518981923058:2017607-video:2017607%3A4475515520876570:page_100206_home:2286908003:4475518981923058:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hDMWXL" alt="http://t.cn/A6hDMWXL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

	                                        	        		    		                		        	        	<div action-data="cur_visible=0" tbinfo="ouid=2286908003" action-type="feed_list_item" diss-data="" mid="4475517065540911" class="WB_cardwrap WB_feed_type S_bg2 WB_feed_vipcover WB_feed_like ">
        <div class="WB_feed_detail clearfix" node-type="feed_content" style="background-image:url(//vip.storage.weibo.com/feed_cover/star_1218_pc_x2.png?version=8360e4a841c8aaec)">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4475517065540911" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvGxInfrx?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-24 15:38" date="1582529882000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4475517065540911:fromprofile"> 2月24日 15:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%93%B6%E8%A1%8C%E7%BB%99%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E8%B4%B7%E6%AC%BE%E8%83%BD%E6%97%A9%E8%B4%B7%E5%B0%BD%E6%97%A9%E8%B4%B7%23&amp;from=default">#银行给企业贷款能早贷尽早贷#</a> 不能让其从“轻症”拖到“危症”】在24日国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会上， 叶燕斐表示：目前一些企业受疫情影响，出现暂时困难，但如果其整体的经济基本面向好，就可以贷款给它，帮企业就是帮银行自己。就像疫病一样，不能让它从轻症拖成重症，从重症就拖成危症。帮助 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvGxInfrx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4475517065540911:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4475517065540911&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%236%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E4%B8%8B%E8%B0%83%E5%BA%94%E6%80%A5%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%23&amp;from=default">#6省份下调应急响应级别#</a>】21日至24日，甘肃、辽宁、贵州、云南4省先后将突发公共卫生事件应急响应级别由一级调整为三级，山西、广东由一级调整为二级。全国新增确诊病例数已连续5天在1000例以下，现有确诊病例数近一周以来呈下降趋势，所有省份新增出院病例数均大于或等于新增确诊病例数。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                 【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%A5%E9%98%B2%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&from=default\">#青岛要求严防境外人员输入#<\/a>】24日下午，青岛市新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部召开会议强调：要在全面做好社区防控的同时，严防境外人员输入，强化风险评估和口岸检疫，严格落实来青人员体温检测和居家隔离等措施，主动做好外籍人士沟通解释和服务保障工作，坚决防止疫情输入扩散。<a                                                                                  【钟南山：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E5%83%8F%E6%B5%81%E6%84%9F%E7%BB%8F%E5%B8%B8%E6%80%A7%E7%88%86%E5%8F%91%23&from=default\">#新冠病毒不会像流感经常性爆发#<\/a>】国家卫健委高级别专家组组长钟南山：SARS在17年间有零星地出现，但没形成气候。COVID-19将来会不会长期存在、只不过没有形成爆发形势？也有可能。关键就是要控制它到最少。我认为它不会像流感，流感每年都有，这种可能性应该较小。（央视）                                                                                  【人民网评：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%87%E5%BA%A6%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%E6%97%A0%E5%BC%82%E4%BA%8E%E6%95%A3%E6%AF%92%23&from=default\">#过度消毒无异于散毒#<\/a>】消毒是个技术活。不同地区和场合，需要选择相适应的消毒用品。同时，对消毒用品的成分、浓度、时长、消毒方式等都大有讲究。那些不考虑现实场合，只讲究表面的“快、准、狠”消毒，容易埋下药物残留的隐患，对人体和居家安全造成损害。同时，也不一定能达到理想消毒
